page.title: 14The Dixon Brothers.1.
page.content: Jeremiah and George Dixon are perhaps the most famous people to have lived in this area.George was born in 1731 and Jeremiah in 1733.Not much is known about their private lives.They were probably born in Cockfield.Their father was a servant on the Raby Estates,where he was so highly thought of that his picture was hung in the castle.It is known that the two brothers lived for some time in Garden House,Cockfield,a building still inhabited today.Their achievements brought them world,wide fame,but little is known of the men themselves.In 1977 an old stone trough was moved onto the Green at Cockfield to form part of the Dixon Garden as a project by local school children to mark the Queens Silver Jubilee.
